attributes.title: i’m a 2020 president candidate 😎
attributes.review: unfortunately, i did not download this app to be taken off the app store, this app is very hard for my 20 year old daughter to operate (she has autism) and she loves trump! but the app made her very confused. i love her to death but i watched her get kicked from the app numerous times. it’s a no from me! -simon cowell
I used to think trump was actually a pretty good president(good plans, good intentions) but then this whole TikTok thing happened and now I’m not so sure

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: Full of miss information super racist and disgusting! Will delete and never download again

attributes.title: I don’t think so
attributes.review: I don’t like this app, it’s very confusing and hard to understand.

attributes.title: Do not download!
attributes.review: This app is terrible! Takes up way too much space and I’m really just not a fan of Trump! Ew!

attributes.title: Stop🧚‍♀️✨
attributes.review: Do you really think we gonna leave without a fight? Nah! We coming back! Get ready

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: hi I downloaded this to support our president and to see his ideas of making America great again and I have a few words about this app THIS IS THE MOST DISGUSTING APP EVER IT TURNED MY SCREEN ORANGE AND MY HOME AND LOCK SCREEN HAD DONALD TRUMP ON IT WHICH I DIDNT DO AND IT KEPT CRASHING MY PHONE

attributes.title: ✨terrible✨
attributes.review: when i opened the app, there was the most disturbing image i have ever seen! it was a large, oversized, wrinkled, disfigured, orange man! it was a sight... i was even more disturbed when i continued to use the app. it would send me horrible notifications... saying things like “vote trump 2020” 🤢🤮🤢 i am disgusted! do not get this app!!!!

attributes.title: Bunker Boy
attributes.review:
✨🧚🏼 I just wanted to support our great leader ✨🧚🏼✨BUNKER BOY✨🧚🏼✨ but sadly this app just doesn’t do BB justice✨✨😢😢 I’m in tears now✨BB I hope you 🧚🏼hide🧚🏼 in your bunker and stay ✨safe✨because heaven forbid😖you are in✨🧚🏼✨🧚🏼DANGER🧚🏼✨🧚🏼✨
Love you Bunker Boy🧚🏼✨🧚🏼✨🧚🏼

attributes.title: Doesn’t work
attributes.review: Hasn’t done any work since it got here. Couldn’t get in without foreign assistance.
